What does it cost?

For stained glass and glass appliqué courses held in our Chilham studio, our rates are:-

£130 per person for a two day break / retreat

£195 per person for a three day break / retreat and

£52 per person for each additional day.

 

Prices for glass fusing classes will appear shortly; they will be a bit higher due to the higher cost of materials and kiln use.

Prices include all materials, refreshments during the day and a light lunch.

 

We also offer short breaks, holidays and retreats at other venues around the UK; if you have a group of four to six people, please contact us as we can put a package together especially for you.
